title: Forms | Student Financial Aid and Scholarships | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Student Financial Aid and Scholarships     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Financial Aid and Scholarships      Student Financial Aid and Scholarships   Main Menu    Cost           Cost of Attendance (COA)    Estimating EFC    Financial Need    Paying Your Bill         Financial Aid Steps           Illinois RISE Act    Eligibility    Apply    Verification    Financial Aid Notification    Payment    Summer Financial Aid    SAP Policy & Appeal    Special Circumstances    Rights & Responsibilities    Withdrawing vs. Reducing Hours    FERPA    Calendar         Types of Aid           Grants    Scholarships    Waivers & Assistantships    Loans    Student Employment    Study Abroad    Veterans    Pre-paid Tuition         Forms           2019-2020 Forms    2020-2021 Forms         FAQ           Glossary of Terms    Contact Us         Consumer Information           Academic Programs    Department of Education Complaint Process    Financial Aid Information    Semester Withdrawals    General Institutional Information    Health, Safety and Security    Intercollegiate Athletic Program Participation Rates and Financial Support Data    Student Outcomes    Voter Registration    Notice of Availability of Institutional and Financial Aid Information    Contact Information for Assistance in Obtaining Institutional or Financial Aid Information          Eyebrow menu    Scholarships    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Forms      View Menu            Forms  For convenience, most SFAS forms are available for you to download and print on your local printer. SFAS uses imaging software that requires strict print specifications; therefore, have your printer set up as indicated below.  Please be sure you need to complete a form before filling it out and submitting it to SFAS, and make sure you have selected the appropriate aid year's form. It is advisable to write your UIN on every page of documentation you submit and also to print legibly within the appropriate sections of a form.  This ensures that documents can be promptly read and processed.  Please note, due to the COVID-19 crisis, financial aid is only able to accept uploaded documentation (see PDF Upload Guide for assistance) at this time.  Form Printing Specifications  1.       Look for the PAGE HANDLING Section  2.       Set PAGE SCALING to ‘Fit to Printable Area’  3.       Have the ‘Auto-Rotate and Center’ box checked   2019-2020 Forms  2020-2021 Forms           Forms           2019-2020 Forms    2020-2021 Forms
